returns._interestAmountAccrued: The total amount of debt tokens accrued

getBlockNumber().details: Having this temporarily as virtual for make test easier since for now hardhat doesn't support mine several blocks See more: https://github.com/nomiclabs/hardhat/issues/1112

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

devdoc.title: Non-transferable token that represents users' debts

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the updated (principal + interest) user's debt

debtIndex().notice: Accumulator of the total earned interest rate since the beginning

lastBlockAccrued().notice: The block when interest accrual was calculated for the last time
